text:
Bartosz Bereszyński (born 12 July 1992) is a Polish international footballer. He plays professionally for Sampdoria as a defender.
In May 2018 he was named in Poland's preliminary 35-man squad for the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia.
On 14 March 2020, Bereszyński tested positive for COVID-19, following its outbreak in Italy.
